Reviews.Title: “february 2012, great short stay”
Reviews.Author: lola d
Reviews.Content: pleasant journey dubai stay hallmark hotel al rigga staff especially 2 child helpful tried happy hotel clean smells orientals flowers standard ok short stay rooftop pool clean it´s real dubai center cab expensive 2535 dhs depending traffic special hotel eatable breakfast recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: denymeny
Reviews.Content: fiance hotel november 2011 stayed deluxe beautifully furnished clean quiet nice relax day wandering city staff helpful rooftop pool clean fine except mascara disappeared strange true

Reviews.Title: “No good memory”
Reviews.Author: Kayvan_Z
Reviews.Content: ive stayed 6 days summer 2006 low accomodation staff manager rude didnt help decided sea monday womens day dubai forbidden hotel passengers 20 persons talked manager didnt accept transportation toi wait bus till 1400 oclock 1000 imagine summer dubai hot shining sun cleanthe food fair taxi drivers dont name hotel lot view hotel terrible pool roof ridiculous

Reviews.Content: im hotel 4 transfer hotel paid taxi ourselves 1pm lunch check 3 pm suggest shouting rest half hour 4 sleep twin bed reservation 2 king bed 530 check awful dirty services wasnt cleanthere empty mini bar 2 cold water tea kettle mugs dont wifi password wasnt wifi cable charged password breakfast worst hotels bread choices worst quality lunch breakfast reception stupid didnt helpful act wait taxi car wasnt taxi charged 100 day 14 people lots baggages van 10 baggage wait 45 minute street larger car late flight wasnt 4 hotel guess city season 4 ibn 5 gorgeous

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place”
Reviews.Author: Saim C
Reviews.Content: dubai family 4 days 5 nights wonderful time pool restaurant upstairs settled fun comfortable bathrooms clean water nice stay recommend service bit disappointing didnt send people supplies called time bring items

Reviews.Title: “Very average 4 star Dubai experience. you can do much better in this city!”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel nights pretty minute deal consider easy person easily satisfied am staying doesnt cause discomfort staff service forget faults hallmark hotel try short gist special average 4 star hotel deira 4 star hotels deira similar services makes worse quality food taste specially breakfast buffet average sized clean pool roof cooling arrive bad cleanliness perfect spots pillow bath towels dirty spots stays washing dont change sheets clean change check dont slippers bathroom pair pay 3 dollars pair seen dubai wonder whats bathroom slippers value bad depends hotel doesnt night club dont noise night time visit construction project opposite street bothering bit noise morning dry hotel alcohol served hotel theres mini bar anyway am value bit hotel class cares little run hotel thats takes hope useful

Reviews.Content: hotel clean located heart dubai city centre deira close including 10 min international airport night time busy gentlemen hotspot recommended travelling family including children choose deira choice suitable children
